original: 千八百年後，有遊戲名【三國群英傳】，由於開發品質、難度、成本持續攀升，懇請熱愛三國的玩家們，支持、購買正版！才有足夠的資本，以開發連線對戰的九代。
text: Thousands and eight hundred years later, there is the name of the game [The Legend of the Three Kingdoms]. Due to the continuous increase in development quality, difficulty, and cost, players who love the Three Kingdoms are urged to support and purchase the original! Only then have enough capital to develop the nine generations of online battles.
